title: New & Video: Big K.R.I.T. – R.E.M.
content:
With all (the important) CitR Bros over in Austin putting the final touches together for our SXSW showcase tomorrow at BD Riley’s, I’m once again a lonely solitary blogger chatting about tunes Josh has already heard.

God I hate myself.

Anyway, Big K.R.I.T has sampled James Blake’s cavernously doubtful Wilhelms Scream hook, “I don’t know about my dreams”, into this remarkably introspective and honest new track, R.E.M. It works dramatically well considering the original material is only a couple of years old, and at the very least its making feel slightly better about not being in Austin, I probably wouldn’t enjoy myself anyway.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
